page.title: 07EVENTS HELD IN CURDWORTH
page.content: THROUGHOUT THE YEAR MANY FUND RAISING EVENTS ARE HELD IN CURDWORTH. AN IMPORTANT ONE IS THE CHURCH FLOWER FESTIVAL, DEVISED BY THE WOMENS GUILD IN JUBILEE YEAR 1977 AND NOW AN ANNUAL EVENT. VISITORS COME TO ADMIRE THE FLORAL DISPLAYS AND TO SEE THE BEAUTIFUL CHURCH THE W.I. HOLD AN ANNUAL BARN DANCE AND MEMBERS EXHIBIT AT PRODUCE AND HANDICRAFT SHOWS. IN 1985 THE LANDLORD OF THE BEEHIVE ORGANISED A VERY SUCCESSFUL FETE IN AID OF A NEARBY HANDICAPPED SCHOOL. A LOCAL LADY REGULARLY HOLDS SALES, COFFEE MORNINGS AND COLLECTIONS FOR SAVE THE CHILDREN FUND. ANOTHER LADY HAS AN ANNUAL GARDEN PARTY TO RAISE FUNDS FOR THE DOGS HOME. GENERAL KNOWLEDGE QUIZZES ARE HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL FOR VARIOUS GOOD CAUSES.ORGANISATIONS ALSO HOLD FUND RAISING EVENTS.
